title: XP Alien Spirit
description:
[b]One full DVD "XPAlienSpirit.ISO" x86 SP2 Updated to 12 April 2008

4.33 GB (4,649,385,984 bytes)
Release Date .....: 15 April 2008

Ready for SP3 Final Update

With Office 2007 BLUE Edition ready to install and use[/b] (Patch not needed)

=====================================================================

XP Alien Spirit is [b]based on Windows XP Professional with all the critical updates and hotfixes till April 12, 2008[/b]. It is not Student, or Retail version it is RTM Professional Version!

Decided to go with Updated SP2 [b]because of very soon arrival of Final SP3[/b] on 21 April. So it is maybe better to prepare, and not to risk with Beta SP3 that we don&#039;t know how will react to Final update!
For that reason, [b]nothing, no single thing, is removed from Windows![/b] 

[b]This release is fully compatible with any PC, Single-Dual-or Quatro Core![/b]
[b]No issues at all! It is clean and based on User&#039;s recomendations on Forums! In fact, it is based on User&#039;s wishes![/b]

[b]Latest WGA/OGA (Genuine Advantage) 80411 integrated;[/b]

[b]No serial needed [/b]in clean install (needed only if making upgrade to some earler Windows);

[b]Can install on any disk or Partition[/b];

[b]Drivers integrated, Newest from 12 April 2008[/b]:
DP_Chipset_wnt5_x86-32_803
DP_CPU_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_Graphics_A_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_Graphics_B_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_Graphics_C_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_LAN_wnt5_x86-32_8021
DP_MassStorage_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_Sound_A_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_Sound_B_wnt5_x86-32_804
DP_WLAN_wnt5_x86-32_803
[b]SATA/RAID SUPPORT[/b]

[b]The XP Alien Spirit Setup is very basic one! [/b]

Only with Drivers, Skin (by JJ.Ying), few Programs, Runtimes, .Net Framework 1.1 & 2 with some enhancements, System and Graphic Tweaks! RocketDosk is also preinstalled-can easily configure it with Alien Icons from RocketDock Folder. Ready to use if you like it free of preinstalled Programs.
[b]So you can choose to use it Basic or to install if you wish, more Programs by accessing Windows Post Install Menu (WPI)[/b] through DVD Icon.

Now you can Choose to optionally install:
[b]Full of Applications, more than 100; NO SINGLE CRACK to MESS WITH![/b]
Among the Programs are TuneUp Utilities 2008, UltraIso 9.0, Paragon Partition, Norton Ghost, ESET NOD Antivirus...etc..just to mention few! 
[b]Different VisualStyles[/b], famous Brico Pack, WindowBlinds  (only one at the time of course)! Also Can change Icons (Vista or Alien...) with [b]preinstalled IconPAckager.[/b] There are many Cursors and Sounds accesible through ControlPanel! 
[b]Office 2007 BLUE Edition[/b], with Service Pack and Compatibility addon;
Office 2003SP2 Lite;
More than[b] 330 HQ exclusive Wallpapers;[/b]
More then [b]200 System and Graphic Tweaks[/b] implemented during Setup. If that is not enough and want to go further, just examine the folder on Desktop "eXPerience Tweaks" as requested by Users - all Credits to extraordinary eXPerience!
IE7 & WMP 11 plus hotfixes integrated

[b]No viruses or Troyans[/b], 


[b]Installation[/b]: Approx. 40 minutes. Only once the Setup is slowing down - at T13 (13 Minutes) during the install of Net Framework. 
Download and Unpack (no password). Burn the ISO at lowest possible speed (2x or 4x).

Enjoy!! 
**************************************************
